General.Name: Hisem Co Ltd
General.Description: APACT Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells semiconductor testing equipment in South Korea. It offers package test and inspection equipment. The company was formerly known as Hisem Co., Ltd. and changed its name to APACT Co., Ltd. in March 2020. APACT Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Anseong, South Korea.
